channel.title: Server chrashes on windows vista need help!
channel.description:
ok so i have downloaded chris-scape v1 just to play around on it and i click the source it says server is online and when i click the client and log in and i move like 1 step and it crashes people told me to reinstall java and i did and nothing worked
need help please!!!!!

item.title: Server chrashes on windows vista need help!
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

u gotta edit run and put this:

@echo off cls "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m client 82 highmem -cp exit

Read full topic
item.source: Server chrashes on windows vista need help!

item.title: Server chrashes on windows vista need help!
item.dc:creator: @EzioAuditori EzioAuditori
item.description:
@EzioAuditori wrote:

no it means your java is located in program files(x86) or w/e its called so edit it and change it to C:/programfiles(x86/java…
